about_the_game:
Vampire Tourist is a new type of immersive experience taking place in Central Europe.
You are a "Vampire in Vacation" that finds himself without powers while in this new land so when the opportunity arises to get them back things get complicated.
Experience the European streets and atmosphere during the night (as well as day) and capture the best shots while finding our more about the city, it's mysteries and maybe about yourself.

What players can expect playing the game at current version:
- Immersive "walking simulator" through the streets of Europe
- Monsters/Zombies with Basic Roaming, Roaring, Chasing and Attacking A.I
- Camera sound effects triggered by player movement, velocity, and rotation
- Dynamic Player breathing sound effects which changes when scared
- Advanced Camera customization settings (in camera mode)
- Photo Album/taking photos or just escape/survive the world for as long as you can

Important Keys:

WASD - move around
Space - Jump
J - Photo Mode
L - Camera configure
F - Take Photo
P - View Album

Enjoy the game !
detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD


About the Game

Vampire Tourist is a new type of immersive experience taking place in Central Europe.
You are a "Vampire in Vacation" that finds himself without powers while in this new land so when the opportunity arises to get them back things get complicated.
Experience the European streets and atmosphere during the night (as well as day) and capture the best shots while finding our more about the city, it's mysteries and maybe about yourself.

What players can expect playing the game at current version:
- Immersive "walking simulator" through the streets of Europe
- Monsters/Zombies with Basic Roaming, Roaring, Chasing and Attacking A.I
- Camera sound effects triggered by player movement, velocity, and rotation
- Dynamic Player breathing sound effects which changes when scared
- Advanced Camera customization settings (in camera mode)
- Photo Album/taking photos or just escape/survive the world for as long as you can

Important Keys:

WASD - move around
Space - Jump
J - Photo Mode
L - Camera configure
F - Take Photo
P - View Album

Enjoy the game !
name: Vampire Tourist

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Intel/Amd
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia/Amd
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: yes
  • Additional Notes: Wear headphones for the best experience
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: You are a Vampire, you like photography and long walks in the middle of the night in search of that perfect shot. What is different this time is that your powers just don't work in this place, or at least not so much. Tourism is sometimes dangerous even for a vampire.
